content: I wanted to advertise a late addition to the DevDays schedule, https://eventmobi.com/devdays2019/agenda/9cb8fe44-144f-4047-918d-e149c773b389/728066ab-a69d-43e7-a6f8-181c0f765ed9. Includes info on an EHR implementation with native FHIR support for scheduling, as well as adapters for V3 and proprietary APIs.
